level.text: When applying for reappointment, a notary public who is entitled under a commission and this chapter to charge fees shall submit a summary of his or her notary business for the three (3) months preceding the date of application for reappointment.
The summary of business shall be based on actual records, not estimates.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: ยง 1.5 of Regulation No. 73-13, approved May 24, 1973, 19 DCR 1147, 1148 (June 11, 1973), 25 DCRR ยง 1.5.
